name: twineedle
caption: Twineedle

effect.short: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to [poison]{mechanic:poison} the target.

flavorText:
The user damages the target twice in succession
by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison
the target.
